definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: She smoothed suntan lotion over her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她輕輕地把防曬油塗在胳膊上。

sentences.english: Don't forget your beach shoes, sun hat, and sun screen!
sentences.chinese: 不要忘記你的沙灘鞋，闊邊太陽帽，和防曬油。

sentences.english: Here are the caps. The sun-block is on the cabinet over there.
sentences.chinese: 這邊是帽女，防曬油在那邊的櫃架上。

sentences.english: Consider your skin type when choosing a sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 選擇防曬油時需要考慮個人的皮膚類型。

sentences.english: A sunburned face is not stylish.
sentences.chinese: 擦了防曬油的臉不漂亮。

sentences.english: She oiled herself with sun - tan lotion.
I told you to use sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 我早告訴你要擦防曬油了。

sentences.english: I didn't get sunburned since I was wearing sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我當時搽了防曬油，因此沒有曬傷。
可不要忘了抹點防曬油。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
to prevent heatstroke and reduce temperature
lit. an arrow at the end of its flight (idiom)/fig. spent force
